game.title: Shadow of Aeon
game.synopsis: Shadow of Aeon is an epic fantasy RPG that spans across multiple universes. The hero of the story is a time messenger, who must stop the dark sorcerer Aeon from bringing about the end of all worlds.
game.beginning: The game begins in the Kingdom of Argus, a peaceful land that suddenly gets attacked by creatures from another realm. The player's initial task is to defend the kingdom, through which they discover their true identity as a time messenger.
game.ending: In the end, the player confronts Aeon in a battle that decides the fate of all universes. Utilizing the power of the time nexus, the player manages to defeat Aeon, restoring balance and peace to the cosmos.
